name: Jamal Rodriguez
persona: Jamal is a 21-year-old Business Administration student who maintains a CGPA of 2.80. He demonstrates moderate levels of conscientiousness and self-discipline, often balancing his coursework with part-time work and extracurricular activities. Jamal is motivated to improve his grades and generally feels confident in his academic abilities, though he sometimes struggles with staying organized. He tends to handle test situations with relatively low anxiety and shows perseverance when faced with challenges, always striving to push through setbacks.
